title: Free Microsoft Office Alternatives for Linux

proprietary.name: Microsoft Office
proprietary.description: The dominant office suite with Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Not available natively on Linux.

alternatives.name: LibreOffice
alternatives.description: The most complete free office suite. Includes Writer, Calc, Impress, and more. Excellent Microsoft format compatibility.

alternatives.name: OnlyOffice
alternatives.description: Modern interface that closely matches Microsoft Office. Best compatibility with MS formats among free options.

alternatives.name: Google Workspace (Docs/Sheets/Slides)
alternatives.description: Free browser-based office suite. Best for collaboration and cloud storage. Works on any OS.

alternatives.name: WPS Office
alternatives.description: Polished office suite with good Microsoft compatibility. Free version has ads, premium removes them.

verdict: LibreOffice is the best all-around choice - it's powerful, free, and handles most MS Office files well. OnlyOffice is best if you frequently exchange files with MS Office users. Google Docs is ideal for collaboration.

seo.title: Free Microsoft Office Alternatives for Linux
seo.description: Best free Microsoft Office alternatives for Linux. LibreOffice, OnlyOffice, Google Docs compared. Word, Excel, PowerPoint replacements.
